[![cogxwalkr logo depicting a walking brain wearing tennish shoes and
walking on a
crosswalk.](https://github.com/jrgant/cogxwalkr/blob/dev/logo.png?raw=true)](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

R package for crosswalking measures of cognition.

Methods described in:

Ackley SF, Wang J, Chen R, Hill-Jarrett TG, Rojas-Saunero LP, Stokes A,
Shah SJ, and Glymour MM for the Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging
Initiative. **Methods to crosswalk between cognitive test scores using
data from the Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Cohort**. *Alzheimer’s &
Dementia*. 2025;21(2). doi:
[10.1002/alz.14597](https://doi.org/10.1002/alz.14597)

Funded by grants from the National Institute on Aging (R00AG073454 and
P01AG082653).

`cogxwalkr` is under active development. Please submit bug reports and
feature requests via
[Issues](https://github.com/jrgant/cogxwalkr/issues).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`boot_control()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/boot_control.md)
  : Bootstrap control list
- [`bootstrap_ci()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/bootstrap_ci_methods.md)
  : Calculate bootstrapped confidence limits
- [`bootstrap_crosswalk()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/bootstrap_crosswalk.md)
  : Bootstrap a split routine
- [`cogsim`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/cogsim.md) :
  Simulated cognitive data
- [`crosswalk()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/crosswalk.md)
  [`est_cw_coef()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/crosswalk.md)
  : Estimate crosswalk between cognitive measures
- [`do_crosswalk()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/do_crosswalk.md)
  : Crosswalk an effect estimate
- [`ingest_data()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/ingest_data.md)
  : Check input data
- [`plot(`*`<cogxwalkr>`*`)`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/plot.cogxwalkr.md)
  : Plot information about the bootstrap distribution
- [`print(`*`<cogxwalkr.crosswalk>`*`)`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/print.cogxwalkr.crosswalk.md)
  : Print the results of a crosswalk
- [`print(`*`<summary.cogxwalkr>`*`)`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/print.summary.cogxwalkr.md)
  : Print a cogxwalkr summary
- [`make_unconditional_splits()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/splitting_functions.md)
  [`make_conditional_splits()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/splitting_functions.md)
  [`make_splits()`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/splitting_functions.md)
  : Splitting methods
- [`summary(`*`<cogxwalkr>`*`)`](https://jrgant.github.io/cogxwalkr/reference/summary.cogxwalkr.md)
  : Summarize a cogxwalkr list
